ygData.subject: RE: Disappointments with everquest.
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, I harvest all of my own indulgences.  I don t buy them from dealers, and I suggest not doings so because they put anything from rat poison to embalming
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, I harvest all of my own indulgences. I don't buy them from dealers,
and I suggest not doings so because they put anything from rat poison to
embalming fluid on their products to enhance it (killing your brain in the
mean time).

Now, about trying something new. How is whoever you got your information
about drugs so righteous? It seems you have a strong fear against them, I
would also if they are dealer sold, rat poison LSD is not very good for you.
Although opium and morning glory LSD have no known long term effects (unlike
tobacco and alcohol).

Also I noticed that my original spelling of disappointments was wrong.

Anyways what am I rambling at (another fun feature of substances) I need to
get to school.
I give up on whatever we wear arguing about, lets never mention it again.

-----Original Message-----
From: errors-159870-3032-opium=punkass.com@onelist.com
[mailto:errors-159870-3032-opium=punkass.com@onelist.com]On Behalf Of
Sergey Bukhman
Sent: Sunday, September 12, 1999 6:16 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Dissapointments with everquest.


From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>



Richard Slater wrote:
>
> From: "Richard Slater" <opium@...>
>
> First, when did I say the original post was bad? Second, it was mean as a
> statement to calm down, not a joke but why does a sentence suggesting
> smoking weed come out so bad? Third and most important, try something new
> sometime in your life... maybe any drug would do you some good.
>

Hahahahaha!

Yeah, ok, whatever... "Try something new" :)

Did your dealer use that line on you?

--
Sergey
